quote: Push through the pain, greatness is on the other side.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: One more rep. One more step. Keep going.
author: Ronnie Coleman

quote: Your body is screaming to stop, but your mind is saying 'not done yet.'
author: David Goggins

quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Every rep counts. Make this one your best.
author: Jay Cutler

quote: Your competition is giving up right now. Are you?
author: CT Fletcher

quote: This is where champions are made. Right here. Right now.
author: Ronnie Coleman

quote: Don't wish it was easier, wish you were stronger.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The burn means it's working. Embrace it.
author: Kai Greene

quote: You vs. You. Win this battle.
author: Mike O'Hearn
